name: Fruit Hive-puzzle games
description:
Game Description: Once you begin, you can't stop an elimination game.

Game Features:Super luxuriant fruit combination,with educational and entertainment.
Retain combo of comfortable and experience to eliminate the extreme of pleasure.
You can play anytime and anywhere, no wifi can also play.

Playing Method: This game play method compared with tetris game are more freedom, no time and color limit.
Be put hexagon fruits inside the hive at random.Filled with horizontal or diagonal lines any line will eliminate the score, eliminate the more, the higher the score.
The game also sets the global rankings,let the players play each other, challenge the limit!
